name: dlive-chat-bot
description: Chat bot for DLive streaming service

scripts.go-build:win32: env GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 go build -o server-win32.exe server.go
scripts.go-build:win64: env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o server-win64.exe server.go
scripts.go-build:lin32: env GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 CGO_ENABLED=0 go build -o server-linux32 server.go
scripts.go-build:lin64: env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 CGO_ENABLED=0 go build -o server-linux64 server.go
scripts.go-build:mac32: env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=386 CGO_ENABLED=0 go build -o server-mac32 server.go
scripts.go-build:mac64: env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 CGO_ENABLED=0 go build -o server-mac64 server.go

author: NerveClasp
